00047 
00048 IPXactComponentEditor::IPXactComponentEditor(LibraryInterface* lh, const QFileInfo& xmlLocation, 
00049                                                                                          QSharedPointer<Component> component, 
00050                                                                                          QWidget *parent): 
00051 TabDocument(parent, DOC_PROTECTION_SUPPORT), 
00052 xmlFile_(xmlLocation), 
00053 splitter_(this),
00054 handler_(lh),
00055 component_(component),
00056 editableComponent_(QSharedPointer<Component>(new Component(*component_))),
00057 navigator_(editableComponent_, lh, this), 
00058 widgetStack_(this), indexes_(),
00059 currentIndex_() {
00060 
00061         Q_ASSERT_X(component_, "IPXactComponentEditor constructor",
00062                 "Null Component-pointer was given to IPXactComponentEditor");
00063 
00064         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00065         layout->addWidget(&splitter_, 1);
00066 
00067         // add the widget that displays the navigation tree
00068         splitter_.addWidget(&navigator_);
00069 
00070         // add the stacked widget which shows the item-editors
00071         splitter_.addWidget(&widgetStack_);
00072 
00073         // set the stretch factors for the widgets
00074         splitter_.setStretchFactor(0, 0);
00075         splitter_.setStretchFactor(1, 1);
00076 
00077         // set the size policy for the widget
00078         //setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Preferred, QSizePolicy::Minimum));
00079         setMinimumHeight(MIN_COMPONENT_EDITOR_HEIGHT);
00080 
00081         // instance for retrieving the previously set options for the Component
00082         // editor
00083         QSettings settings("tut.fi", "Kactus2");
00084 
00085         // if geometry is saved then restore it
00086         if (settings.contains("ComponentEditor/geometry")) {
00087                 restoreGeometry(settings.value("ComponentEditor/geometry").toByteArray());
00088         }
00089 
00090         // connect the signal from the navigator that informs when user has selected
00091         // another item to be edited.
00092         connect(&navigator_, SIGNAL(itemSelected(const QModelIndex&)),
00093                 this, SLOT(selectedItemChanged(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00094         
00095         // the signal that informs when user has decided to remove on item in the
00096         // tree
00097         connect(&navigator_, SIGNAL(itemRemoved(const QModelIndex&)),
00098                 this, SLOT(onItemRemoved(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00099 
00100         connect(&navigator_, SIGNAL(itemMoved()),
00101                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00102 
00103         // set up an empty editor to be displayed at startup when no item is 
00104         // selected.
00105         setupNullEditor();
00106 
00107         VLNV const* vlnv = component_->getVlnv();
00108         setDocumentName(vlnv->getName() + " (" + vlnv->getVersion() + ")");
00109 
00110     if (component_->getComponentImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW)
00111     {
00112         switch (component_->getComponentSWType())
00113         {
00114         case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM:
00115             {
00116                 setDocumentType("SW Platform");
00117                 break;
00118             }
00119 
00120         case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_APPLICATION:
00121             {
00122                 setDocumentType("SW Application");
00123                 break;
00124             }
00125         
00126         case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS:
00127             {
00128                 setDocumentType("MCAPI Endpoints");
00129                 break;
00130             }
00131                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_MAPPING: 
00132                         {
00133                                 setDocumentType("SW mapping");
00134                                 break;
00135                         }
00136 
00137         default:
00138             {
00139                 Q_ASSERT(false);
00140                 break;
00141             }
00142         }
00143     }
00144     else
00145     {
00146             setDocumentType("Component");
00147     }
00148 
00149     // Open in unlocked mode by default only if the version is draft.
00150     setProtection(vlnv->getVersion() != "draft");
00151 
00152         selectedItemChanged(navigator_.generalEditorIndex());
00153 }
00154 
00155 IPXactComponentEditor::~IPXactComponentEditor() {
00156         // instance to save the mainWindow settings
00157         QSettings settings("tut.fi", "Kactus2");
00158 
00159         // remove all the editors from the widget stack and delete them
00160         QMap<void*, ItemEditor*>::iterator i = indexes_.begin();
00161         while (i != indexes_.end()) {
00162 
00163                 // remove the widget from the stack
00164                 widgetStack_.removeWidget(i.value());
00165                 
00166                 // delete the editor
00167                 delete i.value();
00168 
00169                 // remove the item from the map and move iterator to next item
00170                 i = indexes_.erase(i);
00171         }
00172         indexes_.clear();
00173 
00174         // save the geometry
00175         settings.setValue("ComponentEditor/geometry", saveGeometry());
00176 }
00177 
00178 void IPXactComponentEditor::selectedItemChanged( const QModelIndex& newIndex ) {
00179 
00180         // make sure new index is valid and is different from old one
00181         if (!newIndex.isValid() || newIndex == currentIndex_) {
00182                 return;
00183         }
00184 
00185     ComponentTreeItem* item = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(
00186                 newIndex.internalPointer());
00187 
00188         void* dataPointer = item->getDataPointer();
00189 
00190         updateOldIndexItem();
00191 
00192         // if there exists an editor for this element.
00193         if (indexes_.contains(dataPointer)) {
00194 
00195                 // set the correct editor to be displayed
00196                 widgetStack_.setCurrentWidget(indexes_.value(dataPointer));
00197         }
00198         // if an element exists but there is not yet an editor created for it
00199         else {
00200                 createNewEditor(item);
00201         }
00202 
00203         // finally if editor changes the currentIndex_ is updated the new one.
00204         currentIndex_ = newIndex;
00205 }
00206 
00207 void IPXactComponentEditor::onItemNameChanged( const QString& newName ) {
00208         
00209         // make sure that some item is selected and the new name is not empty string.
00210         if (!currentIndex_.isValid() || newName.isEmpty()) {
00211                 return;
00212         }
00213 
00214         navigator_.updateItemName(newName, currentIndex_);
00215 }

00217 void IPXactComponentEditor::setupNullEditor()
00218 {
00219         // create an empty editor
00220         ItemEditor* editor = new ItemEditor(QSharedPointer<Component>(), &widgetStack_);
00221 
00222         // add the pointer to the map
00223         indexes_.insert(0, editor);
00224 
00225     // TODO: Create the general editor.
00226 
00227         // add the empty editor to widgetStack and set it as currently visible
00228         widgetStack_.insertWidget(0, editor);
00229         widgetStack_.setCurrentIndex(0);
00230 }

00232 void IPXactComponentEditor::createNewEditor( ComponentTreeItem* item ) {
00233 
00234         Q_ASSERT_X(item, "IPXactComponentEditor::createNewEditor",
00235                 "Null pointer was given as a parameter");
00236 
00237         ItemEditor* editor = 0;
00238 
00239         switch (item->type()) {
00240 
00241                 case ComponentTreeItem::FILESET: {
00242                         
00243                         // create the editor
00244                         editor = new FileSetEditor(xmlFile_, editableComponent_, 
00245                                 item->getDataPointer(), &widgetStack_);
00246 
00247                         break;
00248                                                                                  }
00249                 case ComponentTreeItem::FILE: {
00250 
00251                         // create the editor
00252                         editor = new FileEditor(xmlFile_, editableComponent_, 
00253                                 item->getDataPointer(), &widgetStack_);
00254                         break;
00255                                                                           }
00256 
00257         case ComponentTreeItem::GENERAL: {
00258             // Create the general editor.
00259             editor = new GeneralEditor(this, handler_, editableComponent_, &widgetStack_);
00260             break;
00261                                         }
00262 
00263                 case ComponentTreeItem::MODELPARAMETERS: {
00264             if (component_->getComponentImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW &&
00265                 component_->getComponentSWType() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS)
00266             {
00267                             editor = new EndpointEditor(editableComponent_, 
00268                                                             item->getDataPointer(), this);
00269             }
00270             else
00271             {
00272                 editor = new ModelParameterEditor(editableComponent_, 
00273                                                   item->getDataPointer(), this);
00274             }
00275                         break;
00276                                                                                                  }
00277                 case ComponentTreeItem::PORTS: {
00278             editor = new PortsEditor(editableComponent_, 
00279                                                  item->getDataPointer(), handler_, this);
00280                         break;
00281                                                                            }
00282                 case ComponentTreeItem::PARAMETERS: {
00283                         editor = new ParametersEditor(editableComponent_, this);
00284                         break;
00285                                                                            }
00286                 case ComponentTreeItem::OTHERCLOCKDRIVERS: {
00287                         editor = new OtherClockDriversEditor(editableComponent_, this);
00288                         break;
00289                                                                                                    }
00290                 case ComponentTreeItem::CHANNEL: {
00291                         editor = new ChannelEditor(editableComponent_, item->getDataPointer(), this);
00292                         break;
00293                                                                                  }
00294                 case ComponentTreeItem::BUSINTERFACE: {
00295             if (component_->getComponentImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW &&
00296                 component_->getComponentSWType() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM)
00297             {
00298                 editor = new APIEditor(handler_, editableComponent_, 
00299                                        item->getDataPointer(), this);
00300             }
00301             else
00302             {
00303                             editor = new BusInterfaceEditor(handler_, editableComponent_, 
00304                                     item->getDataPointer(), this);
00305             }
00306                         break;
00307                                                                                           }
00308                 case ComponentTreeItem::VIEW: {
00309                         editor = new ViewEditor(editableComponent_, item->getDataPointer(), handler_, this);
00310                         break;
00311                                                                           }
00312                 case ComponentTreeItem::DEFAULTFILEBUILDERS: {
00313                         editor = new FileBuilderEditor(editableComponent_, item->getDataPointer(), this);
00314                         break;
00315                                                                                                          }
00316 
00317         case ComponentTreeItem::SOFTWARE: {
00318             editor = new SoftwareMappingsEditor(handler_, editableComponent_, item->getDataPointer(),
00319                                                 &widgetStack_, this);
00320             break;
00321                                           }
00322 
00323                 // item type that does not have a direct editor
00324                 default: {
00325                         //emit noticeMessage(tr("The selected item type does not have editor"));
00326                         return;
00327                                  }
00328         }
00329 
00330         connect(editor, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00331                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00332         connect(editor, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00333                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00334         connect(editor, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00335                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00336         
00337 
00338         // add the editor to the widgetStack and connect it's signals
00339         addEditor(item, editor);
00340 }
00341 
00342 void IPXactComponentEditor::onOk() {
00343 
00344         emit noticeMessage(tr("Ok pressed"));
00345 
00346         // apply all the changes in the editors
00347         onApply();
00348 
00349         // if some editors were in invalid state and could not close then dont 
00350         // write the xml and dont close the editor
00351         if (indexes_.size() != 0) {
00352                 return;
00353         }
00354 
00355         // close the IPXactEditor if everything went fine
00356         close();
00357 }
00358 
00359 void IPXactComponentEditor::onApply() {
00360 
00361         bool everythingValid = true;
00362 
00363         // check the validity of the current editor
00364         updateOldIndexItem();
00365 
00366         // iterator to the beginning of the map
00367         QMap<void*, ItemEditor*>::iterator i = indexes_.begin();
00368         // tell each editor to apply the changes if they are in valid state
00369         while (i != indexes_.end()) {
00370 
00371                 // make sure the editor is in a valid state.
00372                 if (i.value()->confirmEditorChange() && i.value()->isValid()) {
00373                         // apply the changes to the editor
00374                         i.value()->makeChanges();
00375 
00376                         // remove the editor from the widget stack
00377                         widgetStack_.removeWidget(i.value());
00378 
00379                         // delete the editor
00380                         delete i.value();
00381 
00382                         // remove the pointer to editor from the map and move i to the
00383                         // next editor
00384                         i = indexes_.erase(i);
00385                 }
00386                 // if one editor is not in valid state
00387                 else {
00388                         everythingValid = false;
00389                         ++i;
00390                 }
00391         }
00392 
00393         // clear the selection in the navigator
00394         navigator_.clearSelection();
00395 
00396         // if everything went ok then apply button is disabled and the settings 
00397         // written into file
00398         if (everythingValid) {
00399                 
00400                 // write the file
00401                 QFile file(xmlFile_.absoluteFilePath());
00402                 if (!file.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly | QIODevice::Truncate)) {
00403                         emit errorMessage(tr("Could not open file %1 for writing").arg(
00404                                 xmlFile_.absoluteFilePath()));
00405                         return;
00406                 }
00407 
00408                 // write the parsed model
00409                 try {
00410                         component_->write(file);
00411                 }
00412                 catch (Write_error error) {
00413                         QString msg(error.what());
00414                         msg += error.errorMsg();
00415                         emit errorMessage(msg);
00416                         return;
00417                 }
00418 
00419                 // close the file
00420                 file.close();
00421         }
00422 }
00423 
00424 void IPXactComponentEditor::addEditor( ComponentTreeItem* item, 
00425                                                                           ItemEditor* editor ) {
00426 
00427         // add the editor to the widget stack and get it's index
00428         widgetStack_.addWidget(editor);
00429 
00430         // save the pointer to the editor in the map with dataPointer as key
00431         indexes_.insert(item->getDataPointer(), editor);
00432 
00433         // set the newly created editor to be displayed
00434         widgetStack_.setCurrentWidget(editor);
00435 
00436         // connect the editor's nameChanged signal to event handler so the name
00437         // change can be informed to the model
00438         connect(editor, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString)),
00439                 this, SLOT(onItemNameChanged(const QString)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00440 }
00441 
00442 bool IPXactComponentEditor::updateOldIndexItem() {
00443         
00444         // if no current index is yet selected
00445         if (!currentIndex_.isValid()) {
00446                 return true;
00447         }
00448 
00449         ComponentTreeItem* item = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(
00450                 currentIndex_.internalPointer());
00451 
00452         // find the editor for current model index
00453         ItemEditor* currentEditor = indexes_.value(item->getDataPointer(), 0);
00454 
00455         // if there was a valid editor
00456         if (currentEditor) {
00457 
00458         // Check if the change is allowed by the current editor.
00459         if (!currentEditor->confirmEditorChange())
00460         {
00461             return false;
00462         }
00463 
00464                 // tell editor to save the settings
00465                 currentEditor->makeChanges();
00466 
00467                 // set items validity according to editor's status
00468                 item->setValidity(currentEditor->isValid());
00469         }
00470 
00471         // tell tree navigator to update the current model index so changes become
00472         // visible instantly
00473         navigator_.updateItem(currentIndex_);
00474 
00475     return true;
00476 }
00477 
00478 void IPXactComponentEditor::onItemRemoved( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00479         // make sure index is valid
00480         if (!index.isValid()) {
00481                 return;
00482         }
00483         // if the index is the current index then set current index to be invalid
00484         // to avoid problems in other functions.
00485         else if (index == currentIndex_) {
00486                 currentIndex_ = QModelIndex();
00487         }
00488 
00489         ComponentTreeItem* item = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(
00490                 index.internalPointer());
00491         Q_ASSERT_X(item, "IPXactComponentEditor::onItemRemoved",
00492                 "static_cast failed to give valid ComponentTreeItem-pointer");
00493 
00494         // get all the dataPointers that can be used to remove the matching editors
00495         QList<void*> dataPointers;
00496         item->getDataPointers(dataPointers);
00497 
00498         // remove all the widgets for the elements but start at the end of the
00499         // list because the elements must be removed so that lower-hierarchy ones 
00500         // are removed first. The list is created recursively so the low-hierarchy
00501         // elements are at the end of the list.
00502         for (int i = dataPointers.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
00503                 
00504                 // find the editor for the dataPointer, if editor does not exist then
00505                 // return a null pointer
00506                 ItemEditor* editor = indexes_.value(dataPointers.at(i), 0);
00507                 
00508                 // if editor didn't exits
00509                 if (!editor) {
00510 
00511                         // there is no need to remove anything because the editor did not
00512                         // exist and we can move to next editor to be removed
00513                         continue;
00514                 }
00515 
00516                 // erase the key-value pair from the map
00517                 indexes_.erase(indexes_.find(dataPointers.at(i)));
00518 
00519                 // remove editor from stackedWidget
00520                 widgetStack_.removeWidget(editor);
00521 
00522                 // tell the editor to destroy the model
00523                 editor->removeModel();
00524 
00525                 // free the allocated memory for the editor
00526                 delete editor;          
00527         }
00528 
00529     emit contentChanged();
00530 }
00531 
00532 VLNV IPXactComponentEditor::getComponentVLNV() const {
00533         return *component_->getVlnv();
00534 }
00535 
00536 bool IPXactComponentEditor::save() {
00537 
00538         // if all editors were valid then document can be written to disk
00539         if (saveEditors()) {
00540 
00541                 *component_ = *editableComponent_;
00542                 handler_->writeModelToFile(component_);
00543 
00544                 return TabDocument::save();
00545         }
00546         // there was errors so do not write
00547         else {
00548                 emit errorMessage(tr("Component was not valid and was not saved to disk."));
00549                 return false;
00550         }
00551 }
00552 
00553 bool IPXactComponentEditor::saveEditors() {
00554         bool everythingValid = true;
00555 
00556         // check the validity of the current editor
00557         updateOldIndexItem();
00558 
00559         // iterator to the beginning of the map
00560         QMap<void*, ItemEditor*>::iterator i = indexes_.begin();
00561         // tell each editor to apply the changes if they are in valid state
00562         while (i != indexes_.end()) {
00563 
00564                 // make sure the editor is in a valid state.
00565                 if (i.value()->confirmEditorChange() && i.value()->isValid()) {
00566                         // apply the changes to the editor
00567                         i.value()->makeChanges();
00568 
00569                         // remove the editor from the widget stack
00570                         widgetStack_.removeWidget(i.value());
00571 
00572                         // delete the editor
00573                         delete i.value();
00574 
00575                         // remove the pointer to editor from the map and move i to the
00576                         // next editor
00577                         i = indexes_.erase(i);
00578                 }
00579                 // if one editor is not in valid state
00580                 else {
00581                         everythingValid = false;
00582                         ++i;
00583                 }
00584         }
00585 
00586         // clear the selection in the navigator
00587         navigator_.clearSelection();
00588 
00589         // create a null editor because it is needed to display empty editor
00590         setupNullEditor();
00591 
00592         return everythingValid;
00593 }
00594 
00595 bool IPXactComponentEditor::saveAs()
00596 {
00597     // Ask the user for a new VLNV along with attributes and directory.
00598     KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy prodHier = component_->getComponentHierarchy();
00599     KactusAttribute::Firmness firmness = component_->getComponentFirmness();
00600 
00601     VLNV vlnv;
00602     QString directory;
00603 
00604     if (!NewObjectDialog::saveAsDialog(parentWidget(), handler_, *component_->getVlnv(),
00605                                        prodHier, firmness, vlnv, directory))
00606     {
00607         // If the user canceled, there was no error.
00608         return true;
00609     }
00610 
00611         // if all editors were valid then document can be written to disk
00612         if (saveEditors()) {
00613 
00614         // Update the kactus2 attributes.
00615                 editableComponent_->setComponentHierarchy(prodHier);
00616                 editableComponent_->setComponentFirmness(firmness);
00617 
00618                 // create copies of the objects so saving is not done to the original component
00619                 component_ = QSharedPointer<Component>(new Component(*editableComponent_));
00620 
00621                 // make sure the vlnv type is correct
00622                 VLNV compVLNV = vlnv;
00623                 compVLNV.setType(VLNV::COMPONENT);
00624 
00625                 // update the vlnv
00626                 component_->setVlnv(vlnv);
00627                 editableComponent_->setVlnv(vlnv);
00628 
00629         // Write the component to a file.
00630         handler_->writeModelToFile(directory, component_);
00631 
00632                 setDocumentName(compVLNV.getName() + " (" + compVLNV.getVersion() + ")");
00633 
00634                 return TabDocument::saveAs();
00635         }
00636         
00637         // there was errors so do not write
00638         else {
00639                 emit errorMessage(tr("Component was not valid and was not saved to disk."));
00640                 return false;
00641         }
00642 }

00653         navigator_.setLocked(locked);
00654 }

00659 
00660 bool IPXactComponentEditor::onVhdlGenerate() {
00661         
00662         // if the component is hierarchical then it must be opened in design widget
00663         if (editableComponent_->isHierarchical()) {
00664                 QMessageBox::information(this, tr("Kactus2 component editor"),
00665                         tr("This component contains hierarchical views so you must open it"
00666                         " in a design editor and run the vhdl generator there."));
00667                 return false;
00668         }
00669         
00670         if (isModified() && askSaveFile()) {
00671                 save();
00672         }
00673 
00674         QString fileName = handler_->getPath(*editableComponent_->getVlnv());
00675         QFileInfo targetInfo(fileName);
00676         fileName = targetInfo.absolutePath();
00677         fileName += QString("/");
00678         fileName += editableComponent_->getVlnv()->getName();
00679         fileName += QString(".rtl.vhd");
00680 
00681         QString path = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this,
00682                 tr("Set the directory where the vhdl file is created to"),
00683                 fileName, tr("Vhdl files (*.vhd)"));
00684 
00685         // if user clicks cancel then nothing is created
00686         if (path.isEmpty())
00687                 return false;
00688 
00689         VhdlGenerator2 vhdlGen(handler_, this);
00690         vhdlGen.parse(editableComponent_, QString());
00691         vhdlGen.generateVhdl(path);
00692 
00693         // ask user if he wants to save the generated vhdl into object metadata
00694         QMessageBox::StandardButton button = QMessageBox::question(this, 
00695                 tr("Save generated file to metadata?"),
00696                 tr("Would you like to save the generated vhdl-file to IP-Xact"
00697                 " metadata?"), QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No, QMessageBox::Yes);
00698 
00699         // if the generated file is saved
00700         if (button == QMessageBox::Yes) {
00701 
00702                 // add a rtl view to the editableComponent_
00703                 vhdlGen.addRTLView(path);
00704 
00705                 *component_ = *editableComponent_;
00706                 handler_->writeModelToFile(component_);
00707                 
00708                 return true;
00709         }
00710
